Improve this resume bullet:
""• Scope of Work: seeking a creative, talented, reliable, and trustworthy video editor who lives to edit videos for posting on YouTube’s platflorm• How fast you need it delivered: video editor must possess the capabilities to produce deliverables within 48 hours• Whether they’ll work with your team closely or work independently: the video editor will work independently until review. At the time of review, they will work closely with the reviewer, until they receive the “Go to Go” from the buyer/customer.• If there’s potential for more work: if the deliverables are on time and meet our requirements, most definitely there is potential for more work• What you don’t understand about the job and how they can help: if you have any questions, feel free to contact the point of contact via Upwork platform• Required experience: the video editor most have at least 5 years of video editing on YouTube’s platform• Helpful links and references to explain the desired style:[REDACTED_URL] looking for a creative, talented, reliable, and trustworthy video editor who lives to edit videos for posting on YouTube. This video editor must possess the capabilities to produce deliverables within 48 hours. We’re looking for a video editor that has at least 5 years of editing videos on YouTube’s platform. The video editor must be able to speak and comprehend English.We like to work ahead of schedule. For example, if our mission is to post 2 videos every Monday and Wednesday, we expect 2 days to be able to review them for our liking, which provides time for review, potential edits, and a final review. Therefore, the video editor needs to have the video ready for our review on Saturday for Monday’s video posting, and on Monday for Wednesday’s video posting. This gives us, the buyer/customer, time to review and gives the seller/editor, time to do his job to get the final “Go to Go” from us, the buyer/customer.Hourly Range: $20.00-$39.00Posted On: February 17, 2024 01:14 UTCCategory: Video EditingSkills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Documentary, Audio Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Intro & Outro, Sound MixingSkills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Documentary, Audio Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Intro & Outro, Sound MixingCountry: United States""

videos to create compelling content for TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook, optimizing each piece for maximum visibility and engagement.Collaborate with our team to develop strategic content plans for each platform, focusing on increasing followers and driving sales for our coaching business.Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and features on each platform and incorporate them into our content strategy to maintain relevance and momentum.Monitor and analyze the performance of our video content across platforms, making data-driven adjustments to optimize results.Work closely with our marketing team to ensure that video content aligns with our overall brand messaging and objectives.Requirements:Demonstrated experience in video editing and content creation, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful projects across TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook.Deep understanding of how each social media platform works, including audience demographics, content formats, and best Improve this resume bullet:
""Job Title: Creative Designer for a Coffee Table BookProject OverviewWe're looking for a talented and visionary graphic designer to bring to life a coffee table book that celebrates the legacy of a distinguished Homeopathy Doctor. This book isn't just any book; it's a visual journey spanning 97 years, dedicated to both families who cherish their moments with the doctor and professionals who admire his work. This project will immortalize his contributions, inspire future generations, and showcase the essence of his practice.What's the vibe?Visuals speak louder than words, wouldn't you agree? We're aiming for a book that's heavy on eye-catching imagery and light on text—a perfect balance that tells a story through pictures. It's all about capturing the essence and the spirit of the doctor's life, both personally and professionally.Your Mission, Should You Choose to AcceptDesign a 50-60 page coffee table book that reflects the life and work of a Homeopathy Doctor with nearly a century of experience.Focus on creating a visually driven narrative that appeals to both families and professionals.The design should be elegant, timeless, and inspirational, with a keen eye for detail that ensures every page captivates the reader.Collaborate closely with our team to select photographs, documents, and other visual elements that best tell the doctor's story.Prepare the book design in a format that can be easily adapted into a 25-page magazine, focusing exclusively on the doctor's professional life for a different audience.Who Are We Looking For?Do you have a strong portfolio in graphic design, especially in print media like books and magazines?Can you communicate stories powerfully through visuals?Are you detail-oriented, creative, and able to work within a timeline?Do you have experience in or are open to learning about the homeopathy field to better capture the essence of the doctor's life and work?Why Work With Us?This isn't just a job; it's a chance to be part of a project that bridges generations, celebrates a monumental legacy, and creates something that will be cherished for years to come. Plus, we're pretty cool to work with (if we do say so ourselves).Ready to Make Magic Happen?If this feels like a project you'd love to sink your teeth into, let's connect! Send us your portfolio along with a brief cover letter explaining why you're the perfect fit for this project. Can't wait to see your vision come to life. Are you excited? Because we sure are!Budget: $1,000Posted On: February 14, 2024 06:02 UTCCategory: Creative DirectionSkills:Creative Direction, Creative Strategy, Layout Design, Graphic Design, Illustration, Adobe InDesign, Adobe Photoshop, Print Design, Contemporary Style, Adobe Creative SuiteSkills: Creative Direction, Creative Strategy, Layout Design, Graphic Design, Illustration, Adobe InDesign, Adobe Photoshop, Print Design, Contemporary Style, Adobe Creative SuiteCountry: India""

Improve this resume bullet:
""For a business credit funding website aiming to automate the onboarding, application process, and incorporate pre-qualifying tools, a detailed description is necessary to guide the web developer. Here is a comprehensive outline you can provide:### Website Description for Developer**Project Overview:**The objective is to create a business credit funding website that simplifies and automates the onboarding of clients, the application process for funding, and integrates pre-qualifying or preapproval tools. The website should offer a seamless user experience, similar to the workflows seen on businesswarrior.com, disputefox.com, and creditsuite.com, but with unique branding and features that set us apart.**Core Features:**1. **Automated Onboarding System:**- Intuitive step-by-step guide for new clients to create their profiles.- Integration of an automated document upload and verification system.- Customizable client profiles with dashboard access to track application status, available funding options, and educational resources.2. **Application Process Automation:**- Dynamic forms that adjust based on the client's input and needs.- API integrations with credit bureaus and financial institutions for real-time data fetching and analysis.- Secure and compliant data handling processes to ensure client information is protected.3. **Pre-Qualifying/Preapproval Tools:**- Implementation of a soft credit pull feature to offer pre-approval options without affecting clients' credit scores.- Customizable calculators and tools to help clients assess their eligibility and potential funding amounts.- Real-time feedback and suggestions for improving creditworthiness and funding options.4. **Client Dashboard:**- Personalized dashboards for clients to view their application status, funding options, educational content, and progress tracking.- Notifications and alerts system for application updates, required actions, and relevant offers.5. **Educational Resources:**- A comprehensive resource center with articles, videos, and guides on business credit, funding strategies, and financial management.- Interactive webinars and workshops signup feature.6. **Integration with CRM and Other Business Tools:**- Seamless integration with popular CRM systems for efficient client management.- Connection with accounting software for easy financial analysis and documentation.7. **SEO and Content Marketing Tools:**- Blog and content management system for SEO-optimized articles and updates.- Integration of social media sharing tools and newsletter signup for marketing purposes.8. **Security Features:**- Implementation of SSL certificates, two-factor authentication, and other security measures.- Compliance with financial regulations and data protection laws.**Design and User Experience:**- The design should be modern, clean, and professional, emphasizing ease of use and accessibility.- Mobile-responsive design to ensure functionality across all devices and browsers.- High-quality graphics and interactive elements to engage users and provide a visual representation of products and services.**Technical Specifications:**- Development using scalable and secure web technologies (e.g., HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript frameworks).- Cloud hosting for reliability and scalability.- Implementation of analytics tools for tracking user engagement and conversion rates.**Timeline and Milestones:**- Detailed timeline with milestones for the design, development, testing, and launch phases.- Regular updates and review meetings to ensure the project remains on track and aligned with business goals.**Budget and Resources:**- An outline of the budget for the project, including development, design, and ongoing maintenance costs.- Resources available, including access to existing content, brand guidelines, and any third-party tools or services to be integrated.This description provides a foundational blueprint for your web developer to understand your vision, goals, and the technical and design requirements of your business credit funding website. It's important to maintain open and regular communication with your developer throughout the project to ensure alignment with your objectives and to make necessary adjustments based on feedback and testing.Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00Posted On: February 14, 2024 06:01 UTCCategory: Full Stack DevelopmentSkills:Web Application, AI Agent Development, AI App Development, Web Development, WordPressSkills: Web Application, AI Agent Development, AI App Development, Web Development, WordPressCountry: United States""

Improve this resume bullet:
""Do you love organizing chaos and turning big ideas into reality? If mastering Google Calendar and taming inboxes sound like your kind of fun, we want you! We're looking for a not-so-average Executive Assistant to support Wolfgang Croskey, a CEO with businesses as dynamic as a blockbuster movie plot.This job is more than just schedules and emails; it's about making ideas jump off the page and come to life. You'll need to be a Notion ninja, a Slack superstar, and have a knack for making magic happen with Zapier.Ready to join a world where your digital skills will be the superhero cape? Apply now and let's turn the ordinary into extraordinary together!Remote Executive Assistant to the CEO (Innovation and Operations)Job Overview:Seeking a highly organized, proactive, and innovative Remote Executive Assistant to support Wolfgang Croskey, the CEO of multiple businesses. The ideal candidate will not only manage the CEO's Google Calendar and email efficiently but also play a pivotal role in organizing, prioritizing, and facilitating the development of the CEO's business improvement ideas into actionable projects. This role requires exceptional organizational skills, a keen eye for detail, strong project management capabilities, and a passion for innovation.Key Responsibilities:Calendar and Email Management: Maintain and organize the CEO's Google Calendar and email, ensuring efficient day-to-day operations.Idea Management: Catalog, organize, and prioritize the CEO's business improvement ideas, maintaining a digital repository using tools like Notion.Project Facilitation: Coordinate ideation sessions, workshops, and stakeholder meetings to discuss and develop selected ideas further.Implementation Support: Assist in the planning and execution of projects derived from the CEO's ideas, including documentation, tracking progress, and coordinating with relevant teams.Communication and Coordination: Serve as a liaison between the CEO, internal teams, and external stakeholders to ensure smooth communication and project alignment.Tool Proficiency: Utilize digital tools such as Slack, Notion, and Zapier effectively for project management and workflow automation.Required Skills and Qualifications:Proven experience in an Executive Assistant role, with a strong background in project management and operations.Demonstrated ability to organize and prioritize a wide range of tasks and projects efficiently.Proficiency in Google Workspace, Slack, Notion, and familiarity with project management tools (e.g., Asana, Trello).Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, and the ability to facilitate meetings and workshops.Strong problem-solving skills, with a proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues.Ability to handle confidential information with discretion and integrity.Must be available to work from 8am to 4pm Pacific Time Zone.Personal Characteristics:Innovative Thinker: Enjoys brainstorming and developing new ideas, with a keen interest in business innovation and improvement.Detail-Oriented: Meticulous attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and clarity in all tasks.Adaptable: Flexible and adaptable, able to manage shifting priorities and embrace new challenges.Proactive: Anticipates needs and takes initiative to propose solutions and improvements.Collaborative: Strong team player, able to work effectively with diverse teams and stakeholders.What We Offer:A unique opportunity to contribute to the growth and innovation of multiple dynamic businesses.Competitive salary and benefits package, commensurate with experience.A supportive, collaborative, and flexible remote work environment.Opportunities for professional development and growth within the role.How to Apply: [REDACTED_URL] submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your experience in managing projects, facilitating innovation, and your proficiency with the required digital tools. Include examples of how you have successfully organized and implemented business improvement initiatives or projects in the past.Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00Posted On: February 14, 2024 06:00 UTCCategory: Executive Virtual AssistanceSkills:Communications, Project Management, Executive SupportSkills: Communications, Project Management, Executive SupportCountry: United States""

""Project Overview:We are seeking a skilled Android developer to create a custom application tailored for internal use, focusing on label inspection and verification through Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology. This application will be used on Android tablets to facilitate physical inspections of labels on boxes, ensuring that the internal factory labels match the shipping labels. The goal is to automate the verification process, enhance accuracy in order fulfillment, and maintain high-quality control standards.Project Requirements:1. OCR Implementation: The app must incorporate advanced OCR technology to accurately read and extract text from two different types of labels on boxes. The OCR should be highly reliable in various lighting conditions and able to recognize texts effectively from different label designs.2. Data Field Comparison: The application will compare up to 10 specific data fields between the labels on the boxes and an external data source. It must accurately match these fields to verify that the internal factory label corresponds with the shipping label.3. User Interface: The app should provide an intuitive interface prompting the user to scan the labels similar to credit card autofill scans. It must guide users through the scanning process, ensuring ease of use and efficiency.4. Verification and Reporting: After scanning, the app will compare the extracted data fields with those in the external data source and inform the user whether the information matches (correct) or not (incorrect). This feature is critical for quality control and order fulfillment verification.5. Order Fulfillment Tracking: The system needs to keep track of order fulfillment status, as an order may include multiple boxes. The labels will contain data fields that associate them with the completion of the order, and the app must manage and track this association accurately.6. Device Compatibility: The app will be deployed on preselected Android tablets, allowing for a focused approach on compatibility and formatting issues.7. Data Handling: There is no requirement to store pictures of the labels post-scan, ensuring the app remains efficient in data management.Applicant Requirements:1. Proven experience in developing Android applications, specifically with OCR technology and data comparison features.2. Portfolio showcasing relevant work examples, especially apps involving OCR, data processing, and custom user interfaces.3. Ability to work closely with our internal team to understand specific requirements and integrate the app with our external data sources.Application Process:Interested applicants should reach out with their portfolio, highlighting relevant projects. Please include a brief overview of your approach to the project and any preliminary ideas you have for implementing the OCR and data comparison functionalities. Additionally, provide an estimated timeline and budget for the project.This app is aimed at enhancing efficiency and accuracy in label verification processes.Hourly Range: $25.00-$75.00Posted On: February 15, 2024 22:53 UTCCategory: Mobile App DevelopmentSkills:Android SDK, OCR Algorithm, Android App Development, TabletSkills: Android SDK, OCR Algorithm, Android App Development, TabletCountry: United States""

I have attached a sample picture and the background photo so you get the idea.Only apply if you are an expert and have complete knowledge of lighting, shadows, highlights, and realistic composites.IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ BELOW CAREFULLY.My Minimum Expectations for Photo Compositing:Initial Preparation:Start by ensuring the product image and the new background share similar lighting conditions and perspectives. This foundational step is key to a believable composite.Lighting and Color Matching:Adjust the lighting and color temperature of the product to harmonize with the background. Use AI-powered features to analyze and apply changes that align with the desired lighting conditions and color schemes.Shadow and Highlight Refinement:Create or modify shadows and highlights to match the lighting of the background. Consider using generative features for adding realistic textures or shadow details that conform to the lighting environment.Saturation and Color Adjustments:Modify the saturation and colour tones to ensure the product blends seamlessly with its new environment. AI suggestions can be useful for achieving a harmonious colour balance.Detail and Texture Matching:Adjust the clarity and sharpness of the product to match the background's texture. This step is crucial for maintaining consistency in the level of detail between the product and its surroundings.Edge Blending:Smoothly blend the edges of the product with the background, especially in areas where the transition needs to be seamless. This may involve refining complex edges or softening boundaries for a more natural integration.Global Adjustments:Apply overall adjustments to the composite to unify the look and feel of the image. This includes tweaking the contrast, brightness, and color temperature to ensure the entire scene looks cohesive.Filling in Details:Use generative capabilities to fill in any missing details or to correct imperfections within the composite. Please mention " I am next level" when applying for this job. This can be particularly useful for adding realistic elements that were not present in the original images.Final Review:Conduct a thorough review of the composite, ideally on different displays and under various lighting conditions, to catch any inconsistencies. Adjust as necessary to ensure the final image meets the desired level of realism.Additional Tips:Encourage the use of non-destructive editing techniques to allow for adjustments and revisions without permanently altering the original images.Emphasize the importance of patience and attention to detail throughout the composting process. Improve this resume bullet:
""Globe & Citizen Web3.0 Job Posting# WHAT:Welcome to Globe & Citizen! An international startup seeking to become Web3.0's premier distributed news network. Our company is based around 3 projects:- "Celebrity Fanalyzer" (to be rebranded as "Globe & Citizen: News of Our World" in 2025)- Layer8 (A browser based end-to-end-encryption proxy)- Crypto Native Corporation Portal (A web portal for creating Crypto Native Corporations)What is a Crypto Native Corporation (CNC)? A CNC is a company that has an analogous structure to any corporation except that it can be, from the very beginning, globally distributed because it uses crypto as it’s primary medium of economic exchange and governance (see the attached extended explanation, “What_and_Why_of_CNCs.docx”).# WHY:To improve our world and get rich while we do it.# WHO:1 – 4 junior web3 developers with big ambitions! The ideal candidate will be very ambitious and not afraid to learn! Currently the team is comprised of 6 developers and 4 auxiliary members. Spread around the world in Nigeria, Singapore, Venezuela, Pakistan, Uzbekistan, Togo, Brazil, and Canada.# WHERE:Fully remote. You will meet with your team lead for one on ones weekly and join a weekly team meeting. In addition, you will meet with me (the Chief Policy Officer & financier) at least monthly. Ad hoc meetings are also encouraged. All financial transactions will be done through UpWork. We communite using Discord as well and you will upload all your work to one of Globe & Citizen’s Github repos.# PROJECT SUMMARIES:## “Globe & Citizen: News of Our World”Globe & Citizen is dedicated to sanitizing user data so that the anonymized aggregate can be publicly analyzed so that users can decided their own truth about world events. In order to accomplish this, you will complete development of [REDACTED_URL] which is actually Globe & Citizen in stealth mode (see the attached). Your will:- Converting Celebrity Fanalyzer into a DAPP so that the monthly competitions can be run using Ethereum instead of fiat currency (what we have been doing).- Experimenting with how anonymized data can be analyzed and then reflected back to users.- Optimizing. Celebrity Fanalyzer is a Progressive Web App built using Quasar and VueJS## “Layer8: A Browser Based E2E Encryption Proxy”Built using Golang compiled to WASM, Layer8 routes http traffic through a custom server that strips identifying headers before sending the encrypted payload on to a service provider. This has the effect of separating your true identity from your content choices online. Once sanitized, user data can then be aggregated for public analysis and presentation by a service provider.## “Crypto Native Corporation Portal (CNC Portal)”Our goal in 2024 is to complete development of our MVP (Celebrity Fanalyzer + Layer8) while pretending to be 3 different companies entering into smart contracts with each other. Governance and finance for these three pretend “companies” will be done using the CNC Portal that YOU will build using the attached mocks as a guide.The CNC is to be what Github is to Git for anyone wanting to build open source. In short, though a centralized platform is planned, it will facilitate decentralized companies spread around the globe and this is our vision. Why a centralized platform? Because, in the words of Signals founder, “We should accept the premise that people will not run their own servers by designing systems that can distribute trust without having to distribute infrastructure. This means architecture that anticipates and accepts the inevitable outcome of relatively centralized client/server relationships, but uses cryptography (rather than infrastructure) to distribute trust.”# WHY SHOULD I JOIN GLOBE AND CITIZEN?We are an early stage company and your primary task will be to iterate on functionality. This is the most exciting part of software development because it is functionality that defines a product in the minds of users! We are also sustainably self funded which means that we put a premium on the learning and development of our people. We hope you will learn, experiment and bring forward your ideas!# HOW TO APPLYTo begin with, you will join either team Globe&Citizen or team CNC Portal (thougheventually you are like to participate in all projects).1) Apply to this post -- see the 4 questions2) Attend a 1 hour interview.# ABOUT THE COMPANY:Globe & Citizen first came into being October 2022 when the first hires joined on Upwork (all of whom are still with the company 16 months later!) It’s a worker driven company seeking to pioneer a fully remote, globally distributed, business model.# REQUIREMENTS:English. A robust Internet connection. Relevant development experience. And, again, be ready to learn, and learn, and learn. You will joing to work AND push yourslef to develop professionally.Hourly Range: $8.00-$20.00Posted On: February 19, 2024 16:47 UTCCategory: Full Stack DevelopmentSkills:Vue.js, Node.js, Golang, Web Application, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, Web3Skills: Vue.js, Node.js, Golang, Web Application, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, Web3Country: Canada""

""A manual tester is a professional responsible for ensuring the quality and functionality of software applications or systems through manual testing processes. Unlike automated testing, which involves the use of scripts and tools to execute predefined test cases, manual testing relies on human intuition, observation, and experience to assess software behavior in real-world scenarios.Manual testers typically follow test plans and execute test cases to identify bugs, defects, or inconsistencies in the software's behavior. They meticulously document their findings, including steps to reproduce issues and any relevant information that can help developers understand and address the problems.Key responsibilities of a manual tester may include:Understanding project requirements and specifications.Developing test cases and scenarios based on requirements.Executing test cases manually to identify defects or issues.Logging defects and communicating them effectively to the development team.Participating in test case reviews and providing feedback on testability aspects.Collaborating with developers, business analysts, and other stakeholders to ensure comprehensive test coverage.Conducting regression testing to ensure that previously identified issues have been resolved and new changes haven't introduced new problems.Providing input for improving testing processes and methodologies.Ensuring that software meets quality standards and user expectations before release.Manual testers play a crucial role in the software development lifecycle by providing valuable feedback and helping to ensure that software products meet quality standards and user expectations. Their attention to detail, critical thinking skills, and ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders are essential for delivering high-quality software solutions.Hourly Range: $10.00-$21.00Posted On: February 23, 2024 10:27 UTCCategory: Manual TestingSkills:Software QA, Functional Testing, Web Testing, Manual Testing, Bug Reports, Jira, Mobile App Testing, QA Engineering, Regression Test Script, Quality AssuranceSkills: Software QA, Functional Testing, Web Testing, Manual Testing, Bug Reports, Jira, Mobile App Testing, QA Engineering, Regression Test Script, Quality AssuranceCountry: India""

Edit at your own pace.With this posting, a vast knowledge of the Pokémon game franchise will be beneficial to the time it takes you to edit as knowing which critical moments of gameplay are best to include in your edit (Gym battles, new route encounters, etc...) will make cutting down each hour of footage a much swifter process.We are looking for skilled, yet entry-level editors looking to build a portfolio and help us grow our channel. ""Project Brief: Moodle Integration for Automated Report Generation and DownloadBackgroundWe have developed a self-assessment tool using Articulate Storyline, which is hosted on a Moodle site. This script will generate a file (preferably in PDF or Word format) from the HTML report and make it available for authenticated users to download directly within Moodle without manually downloading and opening it in Word.Key Deliverables1. User Authentication: Utilize Moodle's existing authentication to ensure that the report is generated and accessible only for the user who completed the assessment.4. File Access: Provide a direct download link or a Moodle resource/activity that users can access to download their report.5.
